com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.provider

Interface KpiProvider


  • public interface KpiProvider
    Provider for PPM KPIs information
    Since:
    PPM9.42

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Kpi> getAllSharedKpis() 
      Kpi getKpiById(java.lang.Long kpiId)
      Returns the KPI with this id, or null if no such KPI exists.
      KpiValue getLatestKpiValue(java.lang.Long kpiId)
      Returns the latest value captured for a given KPI ID.
      java.util.List<Kpi> getPortfolioBusinessGoalsKpis(long pfmId)
      Gets Business Goals KPIs only, by Portfolio.
      Kpi getSharedKpiByName(java.lang.String kpiName)
      Returns the KPI with this name, or null if no such KPI exists.
      java.util.List<Kpi> searchSharedKpisByName(java.lang.String kpiNameSearchText)
      You can use this method to retrieve all Shared KPIs which names contains the passed text (case insensitive).

    • Method Detail

      • searchSharedKpisByName

        java.util.List<Kpi> searchSharedKpisByName(java.lang.String kpiNameSearchText)
        You can use this method to retrieve all Shared KPIs which names contains the passed text (case insensitive).

      • getSharedKpiByName

        Kpi getSharedKpiByName(java.lang.String kpiName)
        Returns the KPI with this name, or null if no such KPI exists. Since KPI names are unique (case insensitive), this couldn't return more than one result.
        Parameters:
        kpiName - Name of the KPI to retrieve
        Returns:
        the KPI with the passed name (case insensitive), or null if no such KPI exists.

      • getKpiById

        Kpi getKpiById(java.lang.Long kpiId)
        Returns the KPI with this id, or null if no such KPI exists.
        Parameters:
        kpiId - ID of the KPI to retrieve
        Returns:
        the KPI with the passed ID.

      • getLatestKpiValue

        KpiValue getLatestKpiValue(java.lang.Long kpiId)
        Returns the latest value captured for a given KPI ID. The returned KpiValue object contains both the value and the date of the last KPI measure, provided that this date doesn't happens more than 24 hours in the future.
        If no KPI value exists, returns null.
        Parameters:
        kpiId - ID of the KPI we want to get the latest value of.
        Returns:
        the latest KPI Value captured for a given KPI.

      • getAllSharedKpis

        java.util.List<Kpi> getAllSharedKpis()
        Returns:
        All the Shared KPIs currently defined in PPM.

      • getPortfolioBusinessGoalsKpis

        java.util.List<Kpi> getPortfolioBusinessGoalsKpis(long pfmId)
        Gets Business Goals KPIs only, by Portfolio. You won't be able to retrieve these KPIs through the other means, they only work with Shared KPIs. So the only way is to know the ID of the portfolio. These "Business Goal" KPIs will be returned with their name set to the name of their Business Goal.
        Returns:
        All the KPIs that are specific to Business Goals of a portfolio.
